item.title: Hate Speech Detection with Transformers
item.description: tl;dr A step-by-step tutorial to train a hate speech detection model to classify text containing hate speech. The trained model has a BERT-based transformer architecture. Practical Machine Learning - Learn Step-by-Step to Train a Model A great way to learn is by going step-by-step through the process of training and evaluating the model. Hit the Open in Colab button below to launch a Jupyter Notebook in the cloud with a step-by-step walkthrough.
